languages.text: {n}Быстрый взгляд, брошенный на вас, похож на выстрел из автопистолета в упор.{/n} "Если допустить возможность его существования, информация о нем была бы абсолютно секретна. Предлагаю сконцентрироваться на текущей стратегии последовательного подавления очагов опасности".

{n}The glance tossed at you is like a shot from an autopistol at point-blank range.{/n} "If such a plan were to exist, information about it would be of the utmost secrecy. I suggest you focus on the current strategy of putting out each fire as you encounter it."
languages.original_text: {n}Быстрый взгляд, брошенный на вас, похож на выстрел из автопистолета в упор.{/n} "Если допустить возможность его существования, информация о нем была бы абсолютно секретна. Предлагаю сконцентрироваться на текущей стратегии последовательного подавления очагов опасности".

traits.locale_text: {n}The glance tossed at you is like a shot from an autopistol at point-blank range.{/n} "If such a plan were to exist, information about it would be of the utmost secrecy. I suggest you focus on the current strategy of putting out each fire as you encounter it."

{n}The glance tossed at you is like a shot from an autopistol at point-blank range.{/n} "If such a plan were to exist, information about it would be of the utmost secrecy. I suggest you focus on the current strategy of putting out each fire as you encounter it."

{n}The glance tossed at you is like a shot from an autopistol at point-blank range.{/n} "If such a plan were to exist, information about it would be of the utmost secrecy. I suggest you focus on the current strategy of putting out each fire as you encounter it."

{n}The glance tossed at you is like a shot from an autopistol at point-blank range.{/n} "If such a plan were to exist, information about it would be of the utmost secrecy. I suggest you focus on the current strategy of putting out each fire as you encounter it."

languages.text: {n}大审判官瞪了你一眼，他的目光仿佛自动手枪抵在你的头上开了一枪。{/n}“如果真的有这样的计划，那关于它的情报恐怕都会是绝密级的。我建议你专注于当下的策略，遇到野火就及时扑灭。”
languages.original_text: {n}The glance tossed at you is like a shot from an autopistol at point-blank range.{/n} "If such a plan were to exist, information about it would be of the utmost secrecy. I suggest you focus on the current strategy of putting out each fire as you encounter it."

traits.locale_text: {n}审判长瞪了你一眼，他的目光仿佛自动手枪抵在你的头上开了一枪。{/n}“如果真的有这样的计划，那关于它的情报恐怕都会是绝密级的。我建议你专注于当下的策略，遇到野火就及时扑灭。”

languages.text: {n}La mirada que te lanza no tiene nada que envidiar a un disparo de pistola automática a bocajarro.{/n} «Si hubiera un plan como el que sugiere, la información correspondiente sería del máximo secreto. Le sugiero que se centre en extinguir cada incendio según se lo encuentre».
languages.original_text: {n}The glance tossed at you is like a shot from an autopistol at point-blank range.{/n} "If such a plan were to exist, information about it would be of the utmost secrecy. I suggest you focus on the current strategy of putting out each fire as you encounter it."

traits.locale_text: {n}La mirada que te lanza no tiene nada que envidiar a un disparo de pistola automática a bocajarro.{/n} «Si hubiera un plan como el que sugiere, la información correspondiente sería del máximo secreto. Le sugiero que se centre en extinguir cada incendio según se lo encuentre».

languages.text: {n}至近距離からオートピストルで射貫かれるような一瞥があなたに投げかけられる。{/n}「そんな計画が存在するなら、それに関する情報は最重要機密だ。かたっぱしから火を消すという、既存の戦略に集中せよ」
languages.original_text: {n}The glance tossed at you is like a shot from an autopistol at point-blank range.{/n} "If such a plan were to exist, information about it would be of the utmost secrecy. I suggest you focus on the current strategy of putting out each fire as you encounter it."

traits.locale_text: {n}至近距離からオートピストルで射貫かれるような一瞥があなたに投げかけられる。{/n}「そんな計画が存在するなら、それに関する情報は最重要機密だ。かたっぱしから火を消すという、既存の戦略に集中せよ」

languages.text: {n}Le regard que vous lance le seigneur inquisiteur est comme le tir d'un pistolet-mitrailleur à bout portant.{/n} « Si un tel plan existait, toute information à son sujet serait confidentielle. Je vous suggère de vous en tenir à la stratégie actuelle, c'est-à-dire à éteindre les incendies à mesure que vous les croisez. »
languages.original_text: {n}The glance tossed at you is like a shot from an autopistol at point-blank range.{/n} "If such a plan were to exist, information about it would be of the utmost secrecy. I suggest you focus on the current strategy of putting out each fire as you encounter it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le regard que vous lance le seigneur inquisiteur est comme le tir d'un pistolet-mitrailleur à bout portant.{/n} « Si un tel plan existait, toute information à son sujet serait confidentielle. Je vous suggère de vous en tenir à la stratégie actuelle, c'est-à-dire à éteindre les incendies à mesure que vous les croisez. »

languages.text: {n}Dich trifft ein Blick wie ein Schuss aus einer Maschinenpistole auf kürzeste Distanz.{/n} "Gäbe es so einen Plan, unterlägen Informationen darüber höchster Geheimhaltung. Ich schlage vor, Ihr konzentriert Euch auf die aktuelle Strategie, jeden Brand einzeln zu löschen, sobald Ihr einen seht."
languages.original_text: {n}The glance tossed at you is like a shot from an autopistol at point-blank range.{/n} "If such a plan were to exist, information about it would be of the utmost secrecy. I suggest you focus on the current strategy of putting out each fire as you encounter it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Dich trifft ein Blick wie ein Schuss aus einer Maschinenpistole auf kürzeste Distanz.{/n} "Gäbe es so einen Plan, unterlägen Informationen darüber höchster Geheimhaltung. Ich schlage vor, Ihr konzentriert Euch auf die aktuelle Strategie, jeden Brand einzeln zu löschen, sobald Ihr einen seht."

languages.text: {n}Attığı bakış, âdeta kafana dayanmış bir ototabancanın ateşlenen mermisini andırıyor.{/n} "Öyle bir plan olsaydı teferruatının kesinlikle gizli kalması gerekirdi. Sana tavsiyem, denk geldiğin ateşleri söndürerek ilerleme stratejimize odaklanman olur."
languages.original_text: {n}The glance tossed at you is like a shot from an autopistol at point-blank range.{/n} "If such a plan were to exist, information about it would be of the utmost secrecy. I suggest you focus on the current strategy of putting out each fire as you encounter it."
